Text:
Thanks. 

Pity, though. When I read "Scotland" and saw the Quietly art-work I thought I had stumbled upon some Morrison Mini-Series I had missed.
could you upload the red tornado miniseries from 2009

Mirror, do you do transformers? I've been searching for back issues of IDWs transformers, but I havent found anything since 2008 before they released the ongoing series. Thanks for the great torrents either way. Batman always rocks.
